info.description: A service to provide different type of covered-card-service operations.
info.title: covered-card-service

tags.name: ApplicationAuditController
tags.description: Maintains APIs to support the audibility of an application, eg. capturing certain lifecycle events.

tags.name: ApplicationLifecycleController
tags.description: Maintains APIs specific to application life cycle events, like create, update status and references etc.

tags.name: ApplicationReferralController
tags.description: Maintains APIs to support submission and retrieval of QR/referral code

tags.name: ApplicationStatusController
tags.description: Maintains APIs responsible to get and update status for customer's covered card application

tags.name: ApplicationTermsController
tags.description: Maintains APIs specific to T&C, and Contracts for an application

tags.name: OTPController
tags.description: Pass-through for OTP requests to OTP-Service.

Job to rectify discrepancies while new application creation. Implementation looks for applications, not marked duly completed (say, for example, due to request timeouts), and attempts to complete the flow by uploading supporting documents

parameters.description: Salary filter will be considered for non-ETL customers only

get.summary: API to get covered card product Preferences.

cardCategory.description: Card category of the card selected by user from product catalog.

cardCode.description: Card code of the card selected by user from product catalog.

cityCode.description: Required in combination with Etisalat. Specifies the city, your Etisalat number belongs to.

embossingName.description: Name to be printed on the covered-card.

vendorMembershipId.description: MembershipId of the card product e.g. incase of Etihad card it is EtihadGuestNumber and incase of Etisalat it is Registered MobileNUmber.

code.description: Identifier for the base error cause.

desc.description: Describes the error in greater details. It also holds the tracking information.

fieldErrors.description: Usage: Form validations at server. Suggests why server rejected a particular form path /attribute.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the particular error occurred.

vendorStatus.description: Gives insight of what went wrong to the request we made to an external service.

uaeNationality.description: Field specifying nationality of customer is UAE or not.
